AggOO::Base

AggOO::Base Class Reference

#include <AggOOBase.h>

Inheritance diagram for AggOO::Base:

Detailed Description

Remarks:
In all reality, this class is unnecessary. It is provided only as a replacement for GdiplusBase, which provides overloads for 'new' and 'delete,' which is not implemented in AggOO.
